EmailTemplate.name: MPW-RejectChangeRequestForCornerSplitGS
EmailTemplate.subject: Your {!MPW_Change_Request__c.Request_Type__c} request for {!MPW_Change_Request__c.MPW_Prime_Die_Name__c} has been rejected by GlobalShuttle

Your {!MPW_Change_Request__c.Request_Type__c} request for corner split {!MPW_Change_Request__c.MPW_Prime_Die_Name__c} (Form# {!MPW_Change_Request__c.MPW_Form_Name__c}, {!MPW_Change_Request__c.MPW_Train_Name__c}) is not successful.
